LanguageData.JRWCorythosaurusReconstruct.label: Corythosaurus
LanguageData.JRWCorythosaurusReconstruct.description:
-- > INGEN INTERNAL CASE FILE #05618-1914 [CORYTHOSAURUS CASUARIUS] CODENAME: CREST >368
An elegant hadrosaur with a brilliant red crest. It uses said crest to make a wide range of sounds, many of which include communicating and warning other herd members.
